content: "London hosted a G-20 meeting last week amid chaos. Chinese communists are now the capitalists, the Anglo-Saxons are being led by a socialist, and Germany is refusing to send troops into other countries. Astronauts aboard the Space Station report that the Earth is spinning backwards." - Argus Hamilton
reply: "London hosted a G-20 meeting last week amid chaos. title: Some things DO change
